trans-unit.source: When a service that derives from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class encounters an exception that it cannot handle, it can call the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> method to tell the workflow runtime engine to raise the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event.

The service passes the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance and the <xref:System.Exception> associated with this event in its call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>.

The workflow runtime engine encapsulates these parameters in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs> and raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event.

From inside of a subscriber to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event, you can read the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> property and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to get the information associated with a particular <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event.
Gets the exception that could not be handled by the service.
A <xref href="System.Exception"></xref> that represents the exception that could not be handled by the service.
Gets the <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.

<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> is equivalent to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the workflow instance associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> event.
The <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.
